author: blair
msg: Fix issue 3237 which relative externals may core dump.
When resolving a relative URL, if either the parent directory
URL's or the repository root URL is the server root URL and if the
URL has no / after the hostname then apr_uri_parse() will leave
the path as NULL.  So if it's null, set the PATH to /.

author: arfrever
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r32416, r32421, r32441 and r32442. Vote for some revisions.

author: arfrever
msg: Respect LDFLAGS in SWIG bindings without the requirement of the exporting
